headline.main: BRITISH ARE READY FOR BULGAR BREAK; Action Up to Envoy -- No Need Seen for War Declaration Before Bombing Nazis SOFIA'S MINISTER RESIGNS Representative in London Said to Have Opposed Signing of Treaty and Occupation

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 2 (AP) -- Britain was expected momentarily tonight to announce that her diplomatic relations with Bulgaria had been broken off. This would be Britain's first concrete reaction to Germany's military penetration of the Balkan kingdom, and it may come by tomorrow.
abstract: London Bulgarian Min Momtchiloff resigns in protest to German occupation
